column4: can the ntfs resizer that is in the Ubuntu 5.10 installer reliably resize NTFS partitions?
Will Ubuntu mess up my NTFS partition if I have it resize it during the install?
I don't think I would try to *resize* a NTFS partition and hope to keep the data from the ubuntu installer - i doubt it even offers you the option to resize NTFS (but I could be wrong)

https://wiki.ubuntu.com/forum/installation/Partitioning (Partitioning an NTFS (windows) partition is usualy easy and straightforward. The Warty installer did not have this functionality, but the Hoary installer does.)
